item.description:
Since we got snowed out last month, we'll try again to do the documentary film session for member Ian Anderson's school project. We had to push the date back a few weeks due to the school schedule, and we're trying a Thursday instead of a Friday because it's difficult for him to get student assistents on a Friday. Hope that's not a problem, but if it is, please RSVP 'No' and say so.

I'll note again that if you are not comfortable being filmed, you do not have to be. Please come and sit off-camera.

The group will meet at Hildreth Media Center at Southern Maine Community College. The Media Center is building 11 on the campus map at the hyperlink below.

Voluntary donations will be accepted to cover costs. Note that since a collection was not taken at the November meeting, I will ask people to please be slightly more generous this time ($4) to cover two months.

For more information, see http://www.smccme.edu...
item.name: Portland Maine Oil Awareness January Meetup
